00016 
00017 package WeBWorK::HTML::DropdownRecordList;
00018 use base qw(Exporter);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::HTML::DropdownList - HTML widget for a scrolling list of
00023 records.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 use Carp;
00030 use WeBWorK::Utils::FormatRecords qw/getFormatsForClass formatRecords/;
00031 use WeBWorK::Utils::SortRecords qw/getSortsForClass sortRecords/;
00032 use WeBWorK::Utils::FilterRecords qw/getFiltersForClass filterRecords/;
00033 
00034 our @EXPORT    = ();
00035 our @EXPORT_OK = qw(
00036     dropdownRecordList
00037 );
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 sub dropdownRecordList {
00042     my ($options, @Records) = @_;
00043     
00044     my %options = (default_filters=>[],default_sort=>"",default_format=>"",%$options);
00045     # %options must contain:
00046     #  name - name of scrolling list -- use $r->param("$name")
00047     #  request - the WeBWorK::Request object for the current request
00048     # may contain:
00049     #  default_sort - name of sort to use by default
00050     #  default_format - name of format to use by default
00051     #  default_filter - listref, names of filters to apply by default (unimpl.)
00052     #  allowed_filters - hashref, mapping field name to list of allowed values (unimpl.)
00053     #  size - number of rows shown in scrolling list
00054     #  multiple - are multiple selections allowed?
00055     
00056     croak "name not found in options" unless exists $options{name};
00057     croak "request not found in options" unless exists $options{request};
00058     my $name = $options{name};
00059     my $r = $options{request};
00060     
00061     my $default_sort = $options{default_sort} || "";
00062     my $default_format = $options{default_format} || "";
00063 
00064     my @default_filters = @{$options{default_filters}} ;
00065 
00066     my $size = $options{size};
00067     my $multiple = $options{multiple};
00068     
00069     my $sorts = [];
00070     my $sort_labels = {};
00071     my $selected_sort = "";
00072     
00073     my $formats = [];
00074     my $format_labels = {};
00075     my $selected_format = "";
00076     
00077     my $filters = [];
00078     my $filter_labels = {};
00079     my @selected_filters= ();
00080     
00081     my @ids = ();
00082     my %labels = ();
00083     
00084     my @selected_records = $r->param("$name");
00085 
00086     if (@Records) {
00087         my $class = ref $Records[0];
00088 
00089         ($filters, $filter_labels) = getFiltersForClass(@Records);
00090         if (defined $r->param("$name!filter")){
00091             @selected_filters = $r->param("$name!filter");
00092             @selected_filters = ("all") unless @selected_filters;
00093         }
00094         else {
00095             @selected_filters = @default_filters;
00096         }
00097     
00098         ($sorts, $sort_labels) = getSortsForClass($class);
00099         $selected_sort = $r->param("$name!sort")
00100             || $default_sort
00101             || (@$sorts ? $sorts->[0] : "");
00102         
00103         ($formats, $format_labels) = getFormatsForClass($class);
00104         $selected_format = $r->param("$name!format")
00105             || $default_format
00106             || (@$formats ? $formats->[0] : "");
00107         
00108         @Records = filterRecords({filter=>\@selected_filters},@Records);
00109         
00110         @Records = sortRecords({preset=>$selected_sort}, @Records);
00111         
00112         # generate IDs from keyfields
00113         my @keyfields = $class->KEYFIELDS;
00114         foreach my $Record (@Records) {
00115             push @ids, join("!", map { $Record->$_ } @keyfields);
00116         }
00117         
00118         # generate labels hash
00119         @labels{@ids} = @Records;
00120         %labels = formatRecords({preset=>$selected_format}, %labels);
00121     }
00122     
00123     my %sort_popup_options = (
00124         -name => "$name!sort",
00125         -values => $sorts,
00126         -default => $selected_sort,
00127         -labels => $sort_labels,
00128     );
00129     
00130     my %format_popup_options = (
00131         -name => "$name!format",
00132         -values => $formats,
00133         -default => $selected_format,
00134         -labels => $format_labels,
00135     );
00136 
00137     my %filter_options = (
00138         -name => "$name!filter",
00139         -values => $filters,
00140         -default => \@selected_filters,
00141         -labels => $filter_labels,
00142         -size => 3,
00143         -multiple => 1,
00144     );
00145 
00146     my %list_options = (
00147         -class=>"ScrollingRecordList",
00148         -name => "$name",
00149         -values => \@ids,
00150         -default => \@selected_records,
00151         -labels => \%labels,
00152     );
00153     $list_options{-size} = $size if $size;
00154     $list_options{-multiple} = $multiple if $multiple;
00155     
00156     my $value = $r->param($name) || "";
00157     
00158     map { $size = 4 + length if length > $size } values %{ $options{values} };
00159 
00160     my %textfield_options = (
00161             name => $name,
00162             value => $value,
00163             size => $size,      # we need to calculate this to be the same as the popup_menu
00164     );  
00165     
00166     return CGI::div({-class=>"ScrollingRecordList"},
00167         CGI::textfield(%textfield_options),
00168         CGI::scrolling_list(%list_options)
00169     );
00170     
00171     return CGI::div({-class=>"ScrollingRecordList"},
00172         "Sort: ", CGI::popup_menu(%sort_popup_options), CGI::br(),
00173         "Format: ", CGI::popup_menu(%format_popup_options), CGI::br(),
00174         "Filter: ", CGI::scrolling_list(%filter_options), CGI::br(),
00175         CGI::submit("$name!refresh", "Change Display Settings"), CGI::br(),
00176         CGI::scrolling_list(%list_options)
00177     );
00178 }
00179 
00180 1;
Generated on Fri Jun 8 22:55:34 2012 for WeBWorK2 by  1.6.3
